thread.title: Sting, Mylene Farmer play lovers in 'hot' new music video
thread.title_full: Sting, Mylene Farmer play lovers in 'hot' new music video

title: Sting, Mylene Farmer play lovers in 'hot' new music video
text:
> Entertainment Sting, Mylene Farmer play lovers in 'hot' new music video In this Sept. 17, 2015 photo, Sting and Mylene Farmer pose for a portrait at MSR Studios in New York. Sting and Farmer play lovers in a new music video for their duet. In person, they play like old friends who kiss on the cheek. Farmer remade Sting's 2003 song "Stolen Car" and released the single last month. (Photo by Amy Sussman/Invision/AP)
